entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
